brainly_data.question: There are a total of 82 students in the robotics club and the science club. The science club has 6 fewer students than the robotics club. How many students are in the science club?
brainly_data.subject: Mathematics

all_answers.question: There are a total of 82 students in the robotics club and the science club. The science club has 6 fewer students than the robotics club. How many students are in the science club?
all_answers.subject: Mathematics
all_answers.text:
82= x + y

y= x-6

82= x + (x-6)
82 = 2x - 6  (subtract 6 from both sides to get) 
76 = 2x (divide by 2)
x = 38
